ModMetaData.name: Wing's Blights Expanded
ModMetaData.author: winggar
ModMetaData.description:
Blights in base-game are one of the least interesting events. It appears, you auto-cut blight, and the story goes on. This relatively small mod replaces vanilla blights with a few new ones that ask the player to think a bit deeper before clicking "cut all blight".
Without further ado, the blights: - Boomblight improves crop yields, but makes them INTENSELY flammable. - Spiritblight slightly slows down crop growth and causes occasional manhunter packs. - Hypergrowth doubles crop growth, but halves crop yield and makes crops emit rotstink. - Transformer Mechanites cannibalize plants, stopping their growth and making them yield various metals when harvested. - Waster's Breath improves crop yields, but slows crop growth and makes crops emit toxblight. (requires Biotech)
Feel free to share feedback or suggestions in the comments below. Have a great day y'all.
